landing_1_description: We are here to help with any general incident in Sabah.
landing_2_description: You can report any pre-flood warning to us to take early actions.
landing_3_description: You can request help from us during flood for immediate actions.
faq_1_quest: How do I sign up with this app?
faq_1_ans: After downloaded the Citizen Report app, user can find the sign up button and follow the steps to register an account.
faq_2_quest: How do I login with this app?
faq_2_ans: After downloaded the Citizen Report app, user can find the login button and input the email & password of their account.
faq_3_quest: What happen if I forget my password of this app?
faq_3_ans: User will be able to find the 'Forgot Password' on Login screen, then input IC number & email via the app. A reset password email link will send to your email.
faq_4_quest: How can I delete my account?
faq_4_ans: After login, go to Profile tab, find Edit Profile. After enter Edit Profile screen, user will find a 'Delete Account Permanently' option. A confirmation pop up will be shown, if 'Delete' option is selected, user will redirected to send an email to Citizen Report for delete account request.
faq_5_quest: How can I change my password?
faq_5_ans: If user wish to change their password for account safety, they can do so in edit profile. User will find 'Edit Profile' option in Profile tab. Select the 'Change Password' option.
faq_6_quest: What can I edit in my profile?
faq_6_ans: Our app currently supports edit user's name & change password.
faq_7_quest: How can I make a report submission?
faq_7_ans:
User can make a submission via the Citizen Report app, where user will need to choose 'Category', 'Sub-Category' (if available), then proceed to input report details such as:
- Incident image
- Select district
- Add remarks

In report details, the app will also request for user's location to get more accurate location information.
faq_8_quest: Where can I view my submitted report?
faq_8_ans: User can find their submitted report in the 'Report History' tab, where it will list out all the reports user has submitted. Besides, in the Home tab, user will be able to view their latest submitted report. When click on the report items, the app will display the report details that user has submitted.
aboutus_content: Citizen Report Feedback System is a mobile application developed by the Sabah State Government that bridges the gap between citizens and the government. Our mission is to allow individuals to give feedback and to report incidents and send them to the relevant district offices. With our user-friendly interface, we have created a platform that enables seamless and direct interaction between you and the government.
